episodes.title: I missed a step! Cult Leaders do sumn.
episodes.description:
Owen Benjamin is a dangerous predatorial cult leader who ran an investment scam in 2020 during the worldwide pandemic.  This channel and its contents are to bring awareness to the nature of cults and what to look for. This video and channel are for educational and entertainment purposes only. The Texas Goat Radio Show does not encourage bullying of any kind. Any and all material found in this live stream and channel is considered fair use and the commentary is considered a transformative work.

A work is considered transformative if it's used in a new way or for a new purpose than the original work. This can include using a work to criticize or comment on the original, or to incorporate it into a new work with a different meaning or utility. 

This is a link to my new channel if you would subscribe, I would greatly appreciate it - https://youtube.com/@TheTexasGoatRadi...

Other channels and links I would like to show support to by asking you to subscribe are - 

Liz's Channel
https://youtube.com/@elizantoinette?s...

Covert Radio
https://youtube.com/@CovertRadio?si=1...

Beehive
https://youtube.com/@BeehiveExCult?si...

The Official Anti-Owen Subreddit 
  / owenbenjamin  

Owen Benjamin is a problematic figure in the comedy and truther communities. He has "successfully" ran a cult for a number of years named the cult of Beartaria and in doing so he has negatively affected more than a few people's lives. This is a link to a GiveSendGo that will directly set you up to learn more about this situation directly from one of Owen Benjamins victims.

https://givesendgo.com/stopowen?utm_s...

The best way to support this channel is to Subscribe, Like, Comment and Share but if you are interested in showing monetary support here is how you can do that.

https://cash.app/$TexasGoatRadio

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/TexasGoa...

https://patreon.com/TheTexasGoatRadio...
